snippet.title: Borderlands 4: 10 OVERPOWERED Legendary Weapons That Break the Game
snippet.description:
Vault Hunters, Borderlands 4 just got crazy! In this guide we’re showcasing 10 of the most OP legendary weapons and ordnance you can farm right now . From Oscar Mike’s space laser to the devastating Rainbow Vomit shotgun and Hot Slugger, these overpowered items will transform your build and melt bosses. Every legendary in this video can be farmed throughout progression or endgame, making them must-have loot for any Vault Hunter. If you’re hunting the best Borderlands 4 weapons, farming spots, and legendary drops, this is the guide you need!

0:00 Intro
0:20 All 10 Legendaries
0:48 Oscar Mike
2:45 G.M.R.
4:21 Fuse
6:05 Phantom Flame
7:54 Stray
9:39 Hot Slugger
11:14 Ohm I Got
13:19 Wombo Combo
15:11 Rainbow Vomit
17:46 Firepot
19:00 Subscribe For More Borderlands 4
